new_features.whats_new: Updated the version number to 2025.03.4 and modified some operational features.
new_features.impact: This change improves the overall performance and stability by using the latest version.

bug_fixes.whats_new: Removed migration flags from the previous version.
bug_fixes.impact: This should simplify deployment processes and reduce confusion during setup.

tests.whats_new: Introduced tests against ClickHouse Cloud to ensure functionality remains intact.
tests.impact: Guarantees that the application works well with our cloud service without issues after this update.
tests.changes_description: Conducted tests to compare performance and reliability against the ClickHouse Cloud service.

documentation.whats_new: Updated Docker publish usage to employ non-semver tags.
documentation.impact: Facilitates easier version management for users of Docker images.
documentation.changes_description: Now, the Docker tag will be based on the current Git tag name, making it more intuitive.

documentation.whats_new: Removed unnecessary prefix from published images.
documentation.impact: Improves clarity and usability of images for end-users.

others.whats_new: Reduced concurrent runs to a maximum of 50 to optimize performance.
others.impact: This change helps in resource management, ensuring the service runs efficiently without overload.

others.whats_new: Bumped up the versioning of dependencies to leverage improved features and fixes from those dependencies.
others.impact: Keeps the software up-to-date and secure by using the latest versions of dependencies.
